Title: Relates to local government authority to prohibit trade in real fur products
Summary: Relates to local government authority to prohibit trade in real fur products, including but not limited to any article of clothing, fashion accessory, or home decoration that is made in whole or part of real fur.
LawCode: Add ยง11-0114, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to local government authority to prohibit trade in real fur products
